description:
Gaw Ha Leccee is a trainee for the Poseidal Military`s Elite 13 unit, stationed on the planet Koam. When Daba and the others steal a shuttle to head to the planet Mizun, Leccee goes on board in an attempt to get it back. After landing on Mizun she follows Daba and his friends, eventually deciding to defect from the military to join them due to falling in love with Daba. Leccee is constantly in arguments with Amu over him. She is a skilled Heavy Metal pilot.
Eventually Leccee becomes frustrated with the rebel movement and leaves them, joining up with Amandara Kamandara`s group and acting as captain for the space shuttle Whale. She continues to assist Daba and the others throughout the rest of the conflict.
name: Gaw Ha Leccee
